item.title: Latex Walkthrough
item.description: Latex Walkthrough from Jeremy Wright on Vimeo.

item.title: Good Tools, Excellent Results
item.description: This semester for the C++ practicum we are building a clone of Zork. Like many games of the genre, Zork is driven by a database. Our implementation is a JSON database. I chose JSON for a few reasons, but most importantly because its a human readable format that’s simple to understand. I started by editing JSON files by hand in a text editor, however I found very quickly that investigating in a quick tool greatly improved my quality.
